test1.ptxt: Record details of the problem. For your record, use of a questionnaire form will facilitate collecting information for proper analysis and diagnosis.
Check if the problem described in Customer Questionnaire (Example):J24B and N32A Model actually occurs in the vehicle. (This step should be performed with the customer if possible.)
Check ECM, ABS / ESP® control module, 4WD control module (motor-shift type 4WD model) and TCM (A/T model) for DTC, and then record DTC(s).

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s) other than related to cruise control system (other than DTC P0504 and P0575)?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s) related to cruise control system?

test1.ptxt: Check and repair referring to applicable DTC Table:J24B and N32A Model .

action.ptxt: Check and repair malfunction part(s), and go to Step 6.

test1.ptxt: Inspect and repair basic parts referring to Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis:J24B and N32A Model .

action.ptxt: Repair or replace malfunction part(s), and go to Step 6.

test1.ptxt: Check for intermittent problems referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

action.ptxt: Repair or replace malfunction part(s), and go to Step 6.

test1.ptxt: Confirm if the problem is solved and the cruise control system is free from any abnormal conditions. If what has been repaired is related to the DTC, clear the DTC once and then confirm that no DTC is indicated.

testgroup.question: Is there any problem symptom, DTC or abnormal condition?

action.ptxt: Go to 2) of Step 1 and perform trouble diagnosis again.
